name: First Time Scheduling Pick Up
template:
{{greeting}} {{memberName}},

My name is {{agentFirstName}} and I am part of the Costco Logistics Returns team. We attempted to reach you at Phone# {{phone}} to schedule your return pickup. Please be advised that your pickup needs to be scheduled by {{pickupDate}} to avoid cancellation of your return.

You have three options to schedule the return:

1. Contact us at 1-800-955-2292 to be assisted by one of our agents.
2. Self-schedule using the link provided below.
3. Return to your local warehouse.

Your order information:

Order#: {{orderNumber}}
Item#: {{itemNumber}}
Item Description: {{itemDescription}}

To self-schedule, please visit https://logistics.costco.com/userselfschedule and enter your tracking number: {{trackingNumber}}

If you have decided to keep your item, please let us know by replying to this email or giving us a call. We would love to hear from you.

We look forward to hearing from you soon. Have a wonderful day!

{{agentFirstName}} {{agentLastInitial}}.
Costco Logistics Returns Specialist
Costco Member Service Center | 1-800-955-2292
www.costco.com
guide:
Use this template if it's the member's first time scheduling pickup.

Greetings can be updated with the time zone drop down.

Save your first and last name using "Agent Info" to auto fill your name in the template.

Click the blue calendar icon to auto fill the pickup date. Or insert date in MM/DD/YYYY format (7/19/2024)

Click on the Copy to Clipboard button to copy the email template.

Use Paste without formatting (Ctrl+Shift+V) to paste the email template (or open the site in Citrix).

name: Rescheduling Pick Up
template:
{{greeting}} {{memberName}},

My name is {{agentFirstName}} and I am part of the Costco Logistics Returns team. It seems like we missed your scheduled pickup on {{oldDate}}. We attempted to reach you at Phone# {{phone}} to schedule your return pickup. Please be advised that your pickup needs to be scheduled by {{pickupDate}} to avoid cancellation of your return.

You have three options to schedule the return:

1. Contact us at 1-800-955-2292 to be assisted by one of our agents.
2. Self-schedule using the link provided below.
3. Return to your local warehouse.

Your order information:

Order#: {{orderNumber}}
Item#: {{itemNumber}}
Item Description: {{itemDescription}}

To self-schedule, please visit https://logistics.costco.com/userselfschedule and enter your tracking number: {{trackingNumber}}

If you have decided to keep your item, please let us know by replying to this email or giving us a call. We would love to hear from you.

We look forward to hearing from you soon. Have a wonderful day!

{{agentFirstName}} {{agentLastInitial}}.
Costco Logistics Returns Specialist
Costco Member Service Center | 1-800-955-2292
www.costco.com
